alert.note: Alert for Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains; Little Belt and Highwood Mountains; Snowy and Judith Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued April 10 at 1:23PM MDT until April 14 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow has moderate chances of occurring. Total snow accumulations between 4 and 20 inches possible. * WHERE...The Highwood, Little Belt, and Snowy Mountains, and Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains. * WHEN...From Wednesday evening through Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. Travel could be difficult and visibility at times could be below one mile. Those in the backcountry should ensure they have appropriate knowledge and gear and may want to consider alternate plans.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.

area.areaDesc: Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains; Little Belt and Highwood Mountains; Snowy and Judith Mountains
